alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 1:32PM EST until March 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches, with localized higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Webster, Northwest Pocahontas and Southeast Randolph Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster
